item.description:
BODY MIND SYSTEMS INVITES THE PUBLIC TO ITS ADULT SELF-DEFENSE SEMINAR (WEDNESDAY MARCH 14, 2012) AND CHILD SELF-DEFENSE SEMINAR (SATURDAY MARCH 24, 2012)

 

Body Mind Systems, a comprehensive martial arts school located at 263 Main Street, Stoneham, Massachusetts 02180, invites you to support the Stoneham Youth Softball Association by participating at our Self-Defense Seminar Fundraisers on Wednesday March 14, 2012 from 6:30 PM – 8:00 PM for adults (Ages 13+) and on Saturday March 24, 2012 from 1:00 PM – 2:30 PM for children (Ages 6-12).

 

The seminar will teach participants practical self-defense techniques against grabs, punches and kicks. Existing adult students at Body Mind Systems will be learning advanced self-defense techniques at the adult seminar. This seminar is aimed at men and women looking for self-defense training or to refresh their self-defense skills.

 

As part of Body Mind Systems ongoing Success Lecture Series, a guest speaker will briefly address the participants at the end of the child self-defense fundraiser on universal principles that gave them success in life.

 

No prior experience is necessary. Participants should wear comfortable clothing. Classes are open to men and women.

 

Individual participants should bring a $20 donation; for families, additional family members are $10 per person. 100% of the proceeds collected will benefit the Stoneham Youth Softball Association.

 

RSVP at 781-279-1400 or bob.lee@bodymindsystems.com. Visit www.bodymindsystems.com for information about Body Mind Systems.

 

The Stoneham Youth Softball Association is the premier youth softball organization in Stoneham , Massachusetts who establishes teams, games and scholarships for young softball players.

 

Body Mind Systems adult students are investors, executives, professionals, managers, business owners, physical therapists, personal trainers, engineers, self-employed consultants, honors students and others striving for a higher position in society. These individuals use the training, healing knowledge and principles of martial arts for an extra edge in life. They value a strong mind and body so as to have greater happiness and success.

 

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
